footer.tagline: Unique products from creators all over the world.

section1.title: 1. Purpose
section1.content: These terms and conditions of sale govern the contractual relationship between qwibee.com and its customers. By making a purchase on our platform, you unconditionally accept these terms.

section2.title: 2. Services Offered
section2.intro: qwibee.com offers two types of services:
section2.item1: Monthly subscriptions: unlimited access to tech tutorials and applications for the duration of the subscription
section2.item2: Individual content purchases: permanent access to specific tutorials or applications

section3.title: 3. Pricing and Payment
section3.content: Prices are displayed in dollars including all taxes. Payment is processed securely through Stripe. We accept credit cards and other payment methods offered by Stripe.

section4.title: 4. Right of Withdrawal
section4.content: In accordance with current legislation, you have a 14-day period to exercise your right of withdrawal without having to justify your reasons. However, this right is forfeited once you have started accessing digital content, with your prior express consent.

section5.title: 5. Content Access
section5.content: After payment, you receive immediate access to the purchased or subscribed tutorials and applications. Access credentials are personal and confidential. Any unauthorized sharing may result in suspension of your access.

section6.title: 6. Intellectual Property
section6.content: All content on the platform (tutorials, applications, videos, images, texts) is protected by copyright. Any reproduction, distribution, or commercial use is strictly prohibited without prior authorization.

section7.title: 7. Contact
section7.content: For any questions regarding these terms of sale, you can contact us via our contact form.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: qwibee.com is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

section2.title: 2. Data Collected
section2.item1: Email address for account management and communication
section2.item3: Browsing data (cookies, IP address) to improve our services

section3.title: 3. Use of Data
section3.item1: Manage your access to purchased or subscribed tutorials and applications
section3.item2: Process your payments and manage your account
section3.item3: Send you communications related to your purchases
section3.item4: Improve our services and your user experience

section4.title: 4. Data Sharing
section4.content: We never sell your personal data to third parties. Your payment information is processed exclusively by Stripe, our secure payment provider, in accordance with their own privacy policies.

section5.title: 5. Security
section5.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
section6.item1: Right to access, rectify, and delete your data
section6.item3: Right to object to the processing of your data

section7.title: 7. Cookies
section7.content: Our site uses cookies essential to the operation of the platform and the management of your access to tutorials and applications. You can set your browser to refuse cookies, but this may affect your user experience.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.content: For any questions regarding your personal data or to exercise your rights, contact us via our contact form.

creatorTermsOfSale.title: Terms of Sale
creatorTermsOfSale.description: Terms of Sale for qwibee.com creator platform

section1.title: 1. Purpose
section1.content: These terms and conditions govern the purchase of digital content (images, videos, and other media) and subscriptions on the qwibee.com creator platform. By making a purchase, you unconditionally accept these terms.

section2.title: 2. Services Offered
section2.intro: Our platform offers access to exclusive digital content from creators through:
section2.item1: Creator Subscriptions: monthly or recurring subscriptions providing access to exclusive content from your favorite creators
section2.item2: Individual Content Purchases: permanent access to specific images, videos, or other digital media

section3.title: 3. Pricing and Payment
section3.content: Prices are set by individual creators and displayed in dollars including all taxes. Payment is processed securely through Stripe. We accept credit cards and other payment methods offered by Stripe. Subscription prices may be adjusted by creators with advance notice.

section4.title: 4. Right of Withdrawal
section4.content: In accordance with current legislation regarding digital content, the right of withdrawal is forfeited once you have begun accessing or downloading the content, with your prior express consent. For subscriptions, you may cancel at any time, and your access will continue until the end of your current billing period.

section5.title: 5. Content Access and License
section5.content: After payment, you receive immediate access to the purchased or subscribed content. For subscriptions, access is granted for the duration of your active subscription. Individual purchases grant permanent personal access. All content remains the property of the creator. You receive a non-exclusive, non-transferable license for personal use only. Sharing, redistribution, or commercial use is strictly prohibited.

section6.title: 6. Intellectual Property
section6.content: All digital content (images, videos, media) on the platform is protected by copyright and belongs to the respective creators. Any reproduction, distribution, modification, or commercial use without explicit written permission from the creator is strictly prohibited and may result in legal action.

section7.title: 7. Creator Responsibility
section7.content: While we strive to provide a quality platform, individual creators are responsible for their content. Disputes regarding content quality or appropriateness should be addressed through our support system. Creators set their own prices and terms within our platform guidelines.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.content: For any questions regarding these terms of sale, please contact us via our contact form.

creatorPrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
creatorPrivacyPolicy.description: Privacy Policy for qwibee.com creator platform

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: qwibee.com is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information when you access creator content, make purchases, or subscribe to creator profiles on our platform.

section2.title: 2. Data Collected
section2.item1: Email address for account management, authentication, and communication
section2.item2: Payment information (processed securely by Stripe, our payment provider)
section2.item3: Browsing data (cookies, IP address) to improve our services and platform experience
section2.item4: Purchase history, subscription details, and content access records
section2.item5: Preferences and interactions with creator content to personalize your experience

section3.title: 3. Use of Data
section3.item1: Manage your access to purchased digital content and active subscriptions
section3.item2: Process your payments and manage your account and memberships
section3.item3: Facilitate communication between you, creators, and our support team
section3.item4: Send you notifications about subscriptions, new content, and account updates
section3.item5: Improve our platform, user experience, and content recommendations

section4.title: 4. Data Sharing
section4.content: We never sell your personal data. Your payment information is processed exclusively by Stripe in accordance with their privacy policies. We share minimal necessary information with creators (such as subscription status) to enable content access. Creators do not receive your payment details.

section5.title: 5. Security
section5.content: We implement robust technical and organizational security measures to protect your data, payment information, and content access credentials against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration. All sensitive data is encrypted in transit and at rest.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
section6.item1: Right to access, rectify, and delete your personal data
section6.item2: Right to data portability and to receive your data in a structured format
section6.item3: Right to object to processing and to restrict certain uses of your data
section6.item4: Right to withdraw consent for subscriptions and cancel at any time

section7.title: 7. Cookies
section7.content: Our platform uses essential cookies for authentication, content access management, and platform functionality. We also use analytics cookies to understand how you use our platform and improve your experience. You can manage cookie preferences in your browser, though some features may be limited.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.content: For any questions regarding your personal data, to exercise your rights, or for privacy concerns, please contact us via our contact form.

help.tip2: Make sure you entered the correct email address
